data.title: BLISS FOR BRIDE J.LO – INSIDE STORY OF WEDDING TO MARC
data.meta_description:
Here’s Jennifer Lopez basking in wedded bliss moments after marrying hubby No. 3, Marc Anthony, over the weekend. 
  But bliss might not be the word for...
data.text:
Here’s Jennifer Lopez basking in wedded bliss moments after marrying hubby No. 3, Marc Anthony, over the weekend.

But bliss might not be the word for the hunky salsa star after the whirlwind wedding – a new report says he was pressured by the twice-divorced diva.

US Weekly reports that J.Lo put the screws to Anthony to divorce his wife, former Miss Universe Dayanara Torres, so they could get hitched – and he buckled under the pressure.

The bombshell wed the Latin heartthrob in a surprise service at her posh Los Angeles estate.

The ink was only four days dry on Anthony’s divorce papers when he and J.Lo walked down the aisle in front of 30 guests early Saturday night.

The Post scooped the world on the future Lopez-Anthony nuptials back on May 10.

Page Six reported how the singer-actress had started wearing a diamond engagement ring from Anthony, shortly after returning ex-love Ben Affleck’s pink diamond engagement ring.

To the strains of Vivaldi’s “Four Seasons” played by a string quartet, J.Lo, 33, and Anthony, 34, stood at a flower-covered altar under a white canopy and said their “I do’s.”

Lopez’s off-white gown was ankle-length, off-the-shoulder, fitted at the top with layers of ruffles covering her legs.

Her hair was up in a modified beehive with a veil streaming down her back, and she carried a bouquet of white and pink flowers.

Beforehand, Lopez was fitted with baubles by jeweler Neil Lane, and spruced up by makeup artist Scott Barnes and hairstylist Oribe, US said.

Stylists from Dolce & Gabbana applied the finishing touches.

“She looked happy and beautiful,” an eyewitness told the mag.

The groom was dapper – decked out in a cream-colored suit with a striped gray and yellow tie. Bridesmaids wore turquoise dresses.

The ceremony ended with the newlyweds walking up the aisle with a white umbrella as friends and family members cheered.

Lopez and wedding dresses have a long history together.

Last September, she was set to marry Affleck, and had ordered a $15,000 gown from Vera Wang – but the ceremony was cancelled just days before it was scheduled.

She also had blink-and-you’ll-miss-it marriages to waiter Ojani Noa and dancer Cris Judd.

As Lopez and Anthony partied at a small reception afterward, Affleck was recuperating from “a nasty case of bronchitis” at his mom’s home, US Weekly said, but he gave his ex-love’s latest hookup “two thumbs up.”

Additional reporting by Paula Froelich
